name: places/ChIJQ8aOEV9ZwokRba0TypU5fSo
formattedAddress: 30 W 60th St # 1R, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 30 W 60th St # 1R, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text: The back of my neck has been hurting for a while so I decided to visit this place for acupuncture session. I was nervous a little because this was my first time getting an acupuncture session. Dr. Kim was very professional and made me feel very relaxed and comfortable because I was nervous about the needles. To my surprise, it didn't hurt at all. He also did the cupping, heated pad, and massage as well. After the session was over, he double checked with me to see if I still had discomfort in my neck. He put a small needle tape thingy (not sure what it's called.... ) on the part where I felt slight pull and told me to take it off in couple of hours. My neck definitely feels much better than before and I would recommend this place!!

originalText.text: I've been struggling with chronic back pain from a car accident and was treated by Dr. Kim recently. I wanted to try Body Spirit Acupuncture since it's a quick train ride from my office and was immediately put at ease by the warm and welcoming atmosphere. Dr. Kim really knew his stuff. He's so attentive taking time to understand my condition fully. I gone for only two sessions, and my back's feeling way better than prior. Totally would suggest giving Dr. Kim a try. Best in area and I can't recommend him enough.

originalText.text: I've had a fantastic experience with Dr. Kim. For a long I've been suffering with terrible knee pains and overall soreness, so my friend recommended visiting Body Spirit for acupuncture treatment. Even with her high praise, I haven't really had much experience with acupuncture in the past. Man was I proved wrong, even after one treatment I noticed a huge difference. I highly recommend acupuncture, especially treatment from Dr. Kim because his bedside manner, professionalism, and knowledge were honestly unmatched. Will definitely be coming back!!

originalText.text: I had an exceptional experience with Chong Koo Kim acupuncturist and cupping doctor. His expertise and skill in traditional Chinese medicine were evident from the start. The treatments were not only effective but also delivered in a calming environment. I appreciate their thorough explanations, attention to detail, and the positive results I've seen. A five-star rating is well-deserved for his professional and personalized care. Highly recommend

originalText.text: Dr.Kim is incredibly knowledgeable and comforting. Clean and peaceful atmosphere. I have been to several acupuncturists in the area but Dr.Kim really helped my back pain. I have no complaints.
